price: 4. Haayoo, Waxaan karnaa inaan sinno oo sidoodii ka yeelno farahiisa oo dhan.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
